title: where my rewards at?
body: so i've been getting rewards these 2 days coz of the events but then i check my loot and nothing is in there can someone help me plz?

replies.body: What rewards do you think you have gotten?
i got an icon from my notifications and the other rewards didn't show up

The messages around the rewards in the LCU are not related to the Ocean Week event. They're basically previous items that you have received but did not recieve a message for in the new client at the time. [This feature was just turned on in the new client, and you may initially receive some confusing messages.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-)
